sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function CartItem({item,value}){ const {id,title,img,price,total,count} = item; const {increment, decrement, removeItem} = value; return(
product : {title}
price : ${price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
removeItem(id)}/>
item total : $ {total}
) } export default CartItem;
